00020 Cooldown::Cooldown(int timeout)
00021 {
00022         limit = timeout;
00023         current = -1;

00025 BEHAVIOR_STATUS Cooldown::execute(void* agent)
00026 {
00027         current += ws->timeElapsed;
00028         if (current >= limit)
00029         {
00030                 current = -1;
00031                 return BT_SUCCESS;
00032         }
00033         else
00034                 return BT_RUNNING;
00035 }
